Producer: Tom Ackerley, Josey McNamara, Michael A. Pruss, Ridley Scott, Kevin J. Walsh
Production Co: Scott Free Productions, 20th Century Studios, LuckyChap Entertainment, Langley Park Productions
Synopsis: Loretta McLaughlin becomes the first journalist to connect the Boston Strangler murders. As the mysterious killer claims more and more victims, Loretta attempts to continue her investigation alongside colleague and confidante Jean Cole.
Title: Boston Strangler
